# core-toast

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                       | Type                                      | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Optional color of the toast. Defaults to `black`. | `"green" \| "red" \| "white" \| "yellow"` | `"white"` |


## Methods

### `close() => Promise<void>`

`core-toast` close async method to remove from DOM

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
